title: Test Note
text: This is a sample note. When you want to create a note, click the create button. You can add a date, a title, and the text of your note. Then, you simply click Save, and you have a note! You can also edit and delete a note. Go on... Give it a try!

title: Lemonade Recipe
text: I saw this on the back of a bag of lemons: 1. squeeze the juice of 5 lemons. 2. Add to 2 quarts of water. 3. Add 1 cup of sugar. 4. Stir well and refrigerate. Makes 2 quarts.
